name: girl in red
description: A Norwegian singer-songwriter known for her raw and heartfelt lyrics that explore themes of love, identity, and mental health. Her music has become anthems for the LGBTQ+ community.
review: A genuine and refreshing voice in indie music. Her lyrics feel like intimate conversations, making her songs deeply relatable.
notable_works: we fell in love in october

name: King Princess
description: An American singer-songwriter and multi-instrumentalist known for her powerful voice and boundary-pushing music that celebrates queer love and self-expression.
review: Effortlessly cool and unapologetically herself. King Princess’s music is both catchy and deeply meaningful.

name: Freddie Mercury
description: The legendary lead vocalist of Queen, known for his dynamic stage presence, incredible vocal range, and timeless hits like 'Bohemian Rhapsody' and 'Somebody to Love.'
review: An icon in every sense of the word. Freddie Mercury’s charisma and talent are unmatched and will forever inspire.

name: Elton John
description: A British music legend whose career spans over five decades, known for his flamboyant style, unforgettable melodies, and hits like 'Rocket Man' and 'Tiny Dancer.'
review: A true musical genius. Elton John's ability to create timeless songs is nothing short of extraordinary.

name: Troye Sivan
description: An Australian singer-songwriter and actor who gained fame with his introspective pop music that often explores themes of love, youth, and self-discovery.
review: Troye’s music is dreamy and evocative, capturing the essence of modern pop with an emotional edge.

name: Lady Gaga
description: An American singer, songwriter, and actress known for her versatility, theatrical performances, and groundbreaking music that blends genres and pushes boundaries. She is also a strong advocate for mental health and LGBTQ+ rights.
review: Lady Gaga is a powerhouse of creativity and talent. Her music and performances are transformative, leaving an indelible mark on the world of entertainment.

name: Kevin Atwater
description: An emerging artist known for their soulful voice and introspective songwriting, blending raw emotion with soothing melodies.
review: Kevin’s music is deeply personal and captivating, perfect for quiet moments of reflection.

name: Towa Bird
description: A dynamic guitarist and singer-songwriter who blends vibrant energy with sharp, emotionally charged lyrics.
review: Towa’s talent on the guitar is unmatched, and her music bursts with energy and originality.

name: NOAHFINNCE
description: A UK-based musician who brings high-energy pop-punk vibes with unapologetic, heartfelt lyrics about identity and self-expression.
review: Noah’s music is anthemic and empowering, with a fresh take on pop-punk that feels both nostalgic and new.

name: Leith Ross
description: A Canadian singer-songwriter with a gift for storytelling and an ethereal voice that captivates listeners with heartfelt, minimalist tracks.
review: Leith’s songs are beautifully intimate, as though they’re telling you a secret through music.
notable_works: The Time I Spent With You

name: Leanna Firestone
description: A singer-songwriter whose music blends wit and vulnerability, crafting relatable songs about love, heartbreak, and self-discovery.
review: Leanna’s lyrics are as clever as they are emotional, making her music both fun and deeply moving.
notable_works: Why Do I Fall in Love With Every Man I See

name: Abby Cates
description: An up-and-coming artist known for her stunning vocals and ability to infuse pop music with soulful emotion and authenticity.
review: Abby’s voice is absolutely mesmerizing, and her music feels like a warm embrace.
